brief: This is a band pass filter.

methods.name: bw()
methods.desc: Sets the bandwidth for the filter.

methods.name: freq()
methods.desc: Sets the center frequency of the filter.

methods.name: process()
methods.desc: Start applying this bandpass filter to an input signal.

methods.name: res()
methods.desc: Sets the resonance (or 'Q factor') of this filter.

methods.name: set()
methods.desc: Sets frequency and bandwidth of the filter with one method.

description: This is a band pass filter.
name: BandPass
